messages.content: You are an expert in Italian cuisine.
Provide me with a recipe for authentic spaghetti carbonara.

To make authentic spaghetti carbonara, you'll need spaghetti, eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, guanciale, and black pepper. Cook the spaghetti, fry the guanciale, mix eggs with cheese, then combine everything off the heat to create a creamy sauce.
You are an expert in financial planning.
Give me some tips to save money effectively.
To save money effectively, create a budget, track your expenses, set financial goals, automate savings, reduce unnecessary spending, and regularly review your financial plan.
You are an expert in fitness and nutrition.
Provide me with a beginner workout routine.

A simple beginner workout routine includes: 5-minute warm-up, 3 sets of 10 bodyweight squats, 3 sets of 10 push-ups, 3 sets of 15-second planks, and a 5-minute cool-down stretch. Perform this routine 3 times a week.
